thread.title: Dialog Semiconductor Will Buy Atmel For $4.6 Billion
thread.title_full: Dialog Semiconductor Will Buy Atmel For $4.6 Billion

title: Dialog Semiconductor Will Buy Atmel For $4.6 Billion
text:
Get Business & Technology Alerts 
20 Sep 2015 01:27 PM EST 
German chipmaker company Dialog Semiconductor said on Sunday that they have agreed to buy U.S. rival Atmel for about $4.6 billion. Dialog said Atmel shareholders would receive $4.65 in cash and "0.112 of a Dialog Semiconductor American Depository Share for each Atmel common share", resulting in the "economic equivalent" of $10.42 per Atmel share based on Dialog's closing price as of Sept. 18. On Friday, shares in Dialog closed at 45.325 euros apiece, while Atmel shares closed at $7.27.
